forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 49F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
